list_definition.definition: a violent disturbance in the air causing wind, rain, thunder etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The roof was damaged by the storm.

list_definition.definition: a violent outbreak of feeling etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: A storm of anger greeted his speech

list_definition.definition: to shout very loudly and angrily
to move or stride in an angry manner

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He stormed out of the room.

list_definition.definition: (of soldiers etc) to attack with great force, and capture (a building etc)
